text.text_translated: At Girox Foods, the annual employee turnover is 12 per cent. The usual number for other companies is seven per cent. This report has a main goal. It wants to find out why employees work hard. It will give ideas to make working better for employees. It will also help Girox Foods keep its employees.

best_attempt.text_translated:
A `turnover` is when people leave their jobs. New people start.
A `retention` is when people stay in their jobs.
`Employee engagement` means workers like their jobs and want to work hard.

At Girox Foods, our employee `turnover` is about 12% every year. This means 12 people out of 100 leave. The usual number for companies like ours is 7%. So, our `turnover` is high.

The main aim of this report is to find out why workers feel `employee engagement`. The report will offer ideas. These ideas will make the workers' experience at work better. They will help with `retention`. More workers will stay at Girox Foods.
